domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: 100,000 Americans are gone. They were our brothers and sisters. Our friends and neighbors. They were more than a number. They were people we loved. And too many of them could have been saved if our federal government had just done more. https://t.co/sjWPnZfjkd
